short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension used to highlight and unhighlight the selected text.Highlighted texts are saved for you to view and use later.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you highlight and unhighlight a selected text in any chrome tab. All the texts are accessible to you in your dashboard at https://hp.zarvis.in/ . Lots of amazing updates to come by soon. Enjoy using it till then.
